Articles.Content: Title pretty much says it all. Been lurking the forums for a bit, been playing the game since last May. See you all in the Spacecraft Exchange and Mission Reports! ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

Hey! Welcome to our humble abode! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) I hope you enjoy making spacecraft and sharing them with us!

Also, as a quick side note: DO NOT BELIEVE THE "FORUM UPDATE" THREAD! It's a cruel joke played by Squad, and it gave me a heart attack!

Welcome to the forums! Good to have you here.

Happy landings!

> 
> Title pretty much says it all. Been lurking the forums for a bit, been playing the game since last May. See you all in the Spacecraft Exchange and Mission Reports! ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

Welcome! I'm new as well (both to the forums and KSP) ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Happy Kerballing!
Welcome aboard! Lurking is fun, but participating in forum discussion is oohhh so better!
Welcome to our online "home"! See you in the Exchange.
